    • Constructor Detail

      • AnEntity

        public AnEntity(java.lang.String specie,
                int AEx,
                int AEy,
                int EntityEnergy,
                AWorld TheWorld)
        This is the default constructor for the class AnEntity. All of the variables are set based upon the parameter values and then based upon the Species String the image for that Entity is also set.
        Parameters:
        specie - Entity name
        AEx - Entity X value
        AEy - Entity Y value
        EntityEnergy - Amount of energy the entity has
        TheWorld - Which world is the entity in

    • Method Detail

        This is a getter for the entities species tag
        Parameters:
        No - Parameters
        Returns:
        String Entities species tag

        This is a getter for the entities X value

        int Entities X value

      • Setx

        public void Setx(int x1)
        This is the setter for the X value of the entity
        Parameters:
        x1 - this is the value you want to change the entites X value to

      • Sety

        public void Sety(int y1)
        This is the setter for the Y value of the entity

      • isHere

        public boolean isHere(int Sx,
                      int Sy)
        This checks to see if there is an entity at the location passed to the function at (x,y)
        Parameters:
        Sx - This is the x value that is passed to check if there is an entity at the value
        Sy - This is the y value that is passed to check if there is an entity at the value
        Returns:
        Returns True is there is an Entity at the location

      • DisplayEntity

        public void DisplayEntity(GUI GUI,
                          java.lang.String Temp)
        This function compares the Species string that is passed in with the test condition. After it has found a match the Image is then set and sent to the ShowEntity function to be displayed wihtin the GUI.
        Parameters:
        GUI - GUI is passed in to display the images on the canvas
        Temp - Species string that is passed in

      • SetImage

        public void SetImage(javafx.scene.image.Image Image)
        This function sets the image for the currenty Entity calling this function. Based upon the species calling this function it determines which Image is assigned.
        Parameters:
        Image - This is the image from the source folder

      • update

        public void update(int z)
            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This is a dummy function that is called. When this function is called the update(); function in the child classes is called instead allowing for each to update differently.
        Parameters:
        z - null parameter
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • LookFor

        public boolean LookFor(java.lang.String species,
                       Direction D,
                       int range)
        This generic function allows an object of type AnEntity to search for another type of entity with it's radius. If there is an entity within the radius then returns true, if not returns false.
        Parameters:
        species - Species name tag from AnEntity
        D - Enumeration Direction
        range - Range that the Entity can LookFor
        Returns:
        True if the target Entity is found within the search radius
